target: The pets are allowed in the hotel.
context: <user>  I want to have some fun, so can you tell me about some attractions I can visit? <system>  Which is the location where I should look in for attractions? <user>  I want to know about attraction in Paris, and more specifically I am interested in a Museum kind of attraction. <system>  You might enjoy visit Choco-Story Paris - Musee du Chocolat, which is a Museum. <user>  Can you tell me if the entrance is free at this attraction? What phone number can I use to contact them? <system>  Unfortunately, the entrance is not free. If you want to call them you can through 1 42 29 68 60. <user>  Alright, that's good, but are there some other attractions? I will have my kids with me, so I am looking for something which is child-friendly. <system>  There are 9 attractions which match your request. You can consider visiting Cinematheque Francaise, which is a Museum.<user>  Alright, nice. I will need one room in a hotel there then. <system>  There are 10 hotels which you might like. Would you like staying at Ac Hotel By Marriott Paris Porte Maillot, which has a 4.3 rating?<user>  That's just what I want. I would like to make a room booking. I will be there on March 6th, and I will leave next Thursday. <system>  Can you please confirm that you want to book 1 room at Ac Hotel By Marriott Paris Porte Maillot in Paris, and that you will go there on March 6th, and you will leave on March 7th.<user>  Yes, that suits me well. <system>  Your room has been booked.<user>  Can you tell me if pets are allowed there? <system>
